attributes.action: LET ALL THE PEOPLE OF THE UK HAVE A SAY IN FUTURE INDEPENDENCE REFERENDUMS
attributes.background: Just like the EU referendum, an independence referendum affects the interests of everyone in the UK not just the people who want independence. Any major change in the UK done via a referendum including future independence referendums should allow all the people of the UK a say.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to hold a specific UK-wide referendum if that's something you would like to see happen.
